verbs.description: A Monday news conference [V: was] organized in response to President Trump 's gun and school safety meeting that only included Republican attorneys general .
[ARG1: A Monday news conference] was [V: organized] [ARGM-PRP: in response to President Trump 's gun and school safety meeting that only included Republican attorneys general] .
A Monday news conference was organized in response to [ARG2: President Trump 's gun and school safety meeting] [R-ARG2: that] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: included] [ARG1: Republican attorneys general] .
